snippet: Mr. Luke, who over the last three years has been a senior adviser on business, trade and innovation to David Cameron, will rejoin Barclays as a vice chairman and will be based in New York City.
abstract: Mr. Luke, who over the last three years has been a senior adviser on business, trade and innovation to David Cameron, will rejoin Barclays as a vice chairman and will be based in New York City.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Barclays Rehires Tim Luke, an Adviser to Britain's Prime Minister
